a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Comparison of the rates of child mortality estimated by the UN Population Division; UN Inter-agency Group for Child
Mortality Estimation; and IHME, Global Burden of Disease (GBD) study.
Data source: IHME, GBD (2019); UN, IGME via World Bank (2018); UN, IGME (2021); UN, WPP (2022)
